articles.description: ET had reported Tuesday that VPN providers such as Surfshark and NordVPN are unlikely to be able to adhere to a new security directive from Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In).
articles.content:
The government has the right to seek records related to virtual private network (VPN) users in order to combat cybercrimes, said a senior government official.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Ola Electric chief Bhavish Aggarwal says e-scooter fires rare but can happen in future - Economic Times
articles.description: Ola's e-scooter fire was among a spate of similar recent incidents that triggered an uproar on social media and an investigation by the government.
articles.content: There may be more fires in electric scooters in the future but such incidents are very rare, the chief executive of Ola Electric said at a private company event, after safety concerns were heightened… [+2050 chars]

articles.title: Axis MF frontrunning case: Axis Bank awaits probe report; will not take action against mutual fund... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The bank is standing by Axis Mutual Fund CEO and MD Chandresh Nigam after suspending two other fund house officials in connection with frontrunning allegations, say sources. But Nigam’s continuance might run afoul of the regulator.
articles.content: Axis Bank will wait for the findings of an investigation into frontrunning allegations at Axis Mutual Fund before taking a final decision on penalising erring officials, according to people aware of … [+6649 chars]
